name: Webhook Filter Plugin
description: Filter events based on conditions and send to external webhook

config.name: Webhook URL
config.hint: The URL to send filtered events to

config.name: Filter Conditions
config.hint: JSON array of conditions to filter events. Format: [{"property": "event_name", "operator": "equals", "value": "pageview"}]

config.name: Include Event Data
config.hint: Whether to include the full event data in the webhook payload

config.name: Custom Headers
config.hint: JSON object of custom headers to send with the webhook. Format: {"Authorization": "Bearer token"}
